name: Cardlock
description:
How To Play:

  • You can play the map cards (cards with crystals) to plus sign to advance your story.
  • Make decisions using your orange action cards.
  • The items are mainly for combat.
  • Rest to restore your health and draw more maps.
  • If the evil army catches up with you, you will lose...
  • Keep advancing your story until you find the artifact card from the deck.

Cardlock:

  • In this entry for Community Game Jam 2019, you a Cardlock apprentice.  After finding out your evil master's plans, you set on a journey to find the legendary Cardifact to stop him.
  • However the magic of the Zegzarazul, your evil master, is too powerful. As he taps to channels of arcane power, the reality breaks and not everything is what it really seems!
  • Control your Cardlock through this mini-epic adventure to bring down your evil master Zegzarazul.
  • This is a simple card game, however the cards on your hands are not what they are. They can be any card in your hand which has the same type.

Features:

  • 3 different card types
  • Randomly generated adventure each time.
  • Decisions!
